points: Passed the course of lectures on basic and advanced C++ topics
Implemented 2D shooter game in the team of four

projects.name: Rubik's cube
projects.description: 3D visualization of Rubik's cube with intuitive mouse controls. Automatic solver of the cube in less than 21 moves. Using C# with OpenTK for visualization.

projects.name: Med project
projects.description: Open source project for free medical consultations. Built with Django and Bootstrap. Deployed on Digital Ocean.

projects.name: Codeforces helper script
projects.description: Script on Ruby for fast retrieval of problem sample tests. (Codeforces is a platform for programming contests)

projects.name: Stock price forecasting
projects.description: Script on Python for stock price forecasting based on determining repeating patterns. 53% of successful deals.
